15317 | population_density_sq_mi = auto | timezone = | utc_offset = | timezone_DST = | utc_offset_DST = | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code = | website = | footnotes = }} Squirrel Hill is a residential neighborhood in the East End of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, United States. The city splits into two neighborhoods, Squirrel Hill North and Squirrel Hill South, but both are treated as a single neighborhood. ==References== Category:Pittsburgh
